title: Creator Viktor Bug
body: Whenever I play Creator {{champion:112}} my FPS (on average) triples, becomes erratic, and everything rubber-bands  all over the place or freezes for a few seconds (but not 100% of the time, its erratic, much like the FPS)

replies.body:
Hey Corundrom - 

Would you be able to drop me your DxDiag? I'm not able to reproduce this myself, so I'm thinking it may be something to do with your computer specs.
Just as a side note, Creator {{champion:112}} is the only skin of his I have, so I don't know if its a problem with any of his other skins, or just Creator
